title: How do I set a song as a ringtone for incoming calls or new messages?
answer:
l Touch **Settings > Sound > Phone ringtone > Music** to change the ringtone for incoming calls. 


 l Touch **Settings > Sound > Phone ringtone > Music** to change the ringtone for new messages. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45486) 


 l Touch and hold the desired music file in **File Manager**, touch **Set music as > Phone ringtone/Notification ringtone.** 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45487) 

 l You can also enter **Music**. Touch and hold the desired music file in the music list, touch **Set music as > Phone ringtone/Notification ringtone.** 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45488)
